name: Tokyo Street Parking Game 3
description:
Tokyo Street Parking Game 3 is just parking games but i think you'll entertainment our game. Your task is to park your car at the parking lot as soon as possible, before the space is occupied by someone else.
FEATURES
- This exciting and dynamic game is sure to bring you hours of fun.
- Multi-player capability.
- Great HD graphics.
- Many exciting levels.
- Choice of vehicle and the ease of driving.
- Many camera settings for easy parking.
- View from the driver's seat.
